page.title: 09Changing Rossett
page.content:
Before the year 1922, the main road was a small street called Gun Street, now the main road is the main Chester to Wrexham road. There were no street lights until 1939 but they were not actually lit until 1945 because of the war.
Trevalyn Manor during the war was used by the army and after the war it was used as a nursing home. Today it is the Trevalyn Hospital for elderly people.
The Primary School was opened in April 1950. It was built on a field which the villagers used to call the carrot field.
